title: "Your Shop" stuck in loading
body: Wondering if its happening with anyone else, i have already opened all of them, i went to buy RP came back and now constantly loading. Restarted client 3-4 times

replies.body: i didnt even get past thru it to open them...im stuck as well
Yea they just updated the client saying their aware of the issue and their fixing it now ^_^
